Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay

Class Card

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Card extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
A class that represents a card object in the Gameplay scene.
Since:
3/13/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture, Abhinav Bhati
